description: This file defines the FinetuneJob class, which models a training job associated with a dataset in a machine learning finetuning platform. It includes fields for job status, paths to logs and artifacts, error messages, and linkage to a dataset entity.

classes.name: FinetuneJob
classes.description: Represents a simulated training job linked to a dataset, with properties for tracking job status, creation/modification times, associated dataset, and paths to relevant artifacts.

methods.name: FinetuneJob
methods.description: Default constructor for FinetuneJob.

methods.name: FinetuneJob(Dataset dataset, String modelName)
methods.description: Constructor to initialize a FinetuneJob with a dataset and model name.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the job.

methods.name: getModelName
methods.description: Returns the name of the model associated with the job.

methods.name: getStatus
methods.description: Returns the current status of the job.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the job was created.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the job was last updated.

methods.name: getDataset
methods.description: Returns the dataset linked to the job.

methods.name: getLogsPath
methods.description: Returns the path to the logs file for the job.

methods.name: getMetricsPath
methods.description: Returns the path to the metrics file for the job.

methods.name: getArtifactPath
methods.description: Returns the path to the trained model artifact.

methods.name: getErrorMessage
methods.description: Returns any error message associated with the job.

methods.name: isCancelRequested
methods.description: Indicates whether a cancel has been requested for the job.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the job ID.

methods.name: setModelName
methods.description: Sets the model name.

methods.name: setStatus
methods.description: Updates the job status and refreshes the update timestamp.

methods.name: setCreatedAt
methods.description: Sets the creation timestamp.

methods.name: setUpdatedAt
methods.description: Sets the last-updated timestamp.

methods.name: setDataset
methods.description: Links a dataset to the job.

methods.name: setLogsPath
methods.description: Sets the path for logs.

methods.name: setMetricsPath
methods.description: Sets the path for metrics.

methods.name: setArtifactPath
methods.description: Sets the path for the trained model artifact.

methods.name: setErrorMessage
methods.description: Sets an error message for the job.

methods.name: setCancelRequested
methods.description: Flags if a cancel has been requested.
